name: Wizard's Journey (TheVoidVr)
description:
Hello, this is my first kind off finished little game ever. The base concept is a 2.5D platformer where you need to change the camera views to see were you have to go.

This little game was made for a school project en was made in a bit under 3 weeks.

Hope you guys enjoy playing it, it's not perfect but oh well. ^-^
